termsConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsConditions.installment: Based on monthly installment of 24 months. One time administrative charge and monthly invoices charges apply

fullPayment.title: Full Payment Required:
fullPayment.description: Full payment must be made at the time of booking.

classCancellations.title: Class Cancellations:
classCancellations.description: Please cancel classes at least 24 hours in advance on weekdays. For Monday bookings, cancellations must be made by Friday.

riskCancellations.title: Risk 1 and Risk 2 Cancellations:
riskCancellations.description: Cancellations for Risk 1 and Risk 2 must be made at least 2 days in advance on weekdays. For Monday Risk 2 bookings, cancellations must be made no later than Thursday.

termsConditions.thanks: Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.
